entry.title: RT Sam Williams 🐘: 🚨Competition: Build the best degen-friendly start-from-zero coding tutorial for launching a basic web app on the permaweb. Ta...
entry.summary:
RT Sam Williams 🐘 🚨Competition: Build the best degen-friendly start-from-zero coding tutorial for launching a basic web app on the permaweb. Target audience is someone who would call themselves @asscrusader420 online 😄 No more than 5 minutes between memes. Prize: $2500 in AR Deadline: 30 Apr
Sam Williams 🐘: Degens: What would it take for you to quit trading and start building? The control you have on likelihood of a positive financial outcome is far higher, and the work is much more meaningful. Do we need a coding bootcamp with more dank memes or something? 🤔
